overview:
Dear business partners, let me introduce myself.

My name is Julia, I am an enthusiastic and highly self-motivated individual, I am creative, flexible and innovative within a team set up as well as on solo projects. Over 3 years combined experience of IT sales, marketing, recruiting and business development working in IT environments, with a proven eye for customer needs, successful deals, outgoing projects development, company development experience.
